undergraduate.degree: Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering and Computer Science

earlyLife.childhood: Redacted Name was raised in Houston, Texas, and later moved to Miami, Florida. Redacted's mother was a teenager when she had him, and his father was a bike shop owner. His mother remarried, leading to Redacted being adopted by her new spouse, a Cuban immigrant.
earlyLife.interests: From a young age, Redacted showed an interest in technology and inventing. He created a science fair project that involved building a solar oven to cook hot dogs.

earlyCareer.description: Redacted began a career on Wall Street, holding various positions at firms including Fitel, Bankers Trust, and D. E. Shaw & Co.

founding.description: Redacted founded Amazon.com originally as an online bookstore. The company quickly expanded to sell a variety of products, becoming the largest e-commerce platform in the world.

milestones.event: Amazon became the most valuable retailer in the United States.

blueOrigin.description: Founded in 2000, Blue Origin is a private aerospace manufacturer and sub-orbital spaceflight services company focused on making space travel affordable and accessible.

acquisition.description: Redacted purchased The Washington Post for $250 million, revitalizing the newspaper with digital innovations.

bezosExpedition.description: Redacted Expeditions is the personal investment company of Redacted, which has invested in various startups, including Uber and Airbnb.

philanthropy.description: Redacted has pledged significant amounts to charitable causes and initiatives, including education and homelessness.

notableInitiatives.name: Redacted Day One Fund
notableInitiatives.description: Launched in 2018 to fund organizations that help homeless families.

notableInitiatives.name: Redacted Earth Fund
notableInitiatives.description: Announced in 2020 to combat climate change with a commitment of $10 billion.

netWorth.ranking: One of the richest people in the world

awards.award: Time Magazine Person of the Year
Lifework Award by the Museum of Science Fiction
